newsitem.title: POLAND: Outlook mixed for Polish shares on Monday.
newsitem.headline: Outlook mixed for Polish shares on Monday.

text.p: The outlook for Polish shares was mixed on Monday as downturns in continuous trade on Friday suggested a fall but analysts said the Warsaw bourse might follow the Friday rise on the Dow.
Analysts said the supply at Friday's order balancing and falls in the continuous trade could easily translate into a significant fall on Monday.
However they also pointed to the recent Polish investor tendency to follow daily Wall Street changes.
Lentex was likely to extend its Friday's 10-percent gain to 36.3 zlotys, after the stock started trade on Thursday 53.5 percent above issue.
